Hey there, I’m trying to figure out how to make an interactive plot using sliders, I couldn’t understand/find any example. I also don’t understand how the slider exposes its observable. In this minimal example, I can get a plot with a moving slider, but the last point is obviously not moving. Any help would be welcome.
```fig = Figure(resolution = (1200, 900))
ax = fig[1, 1] = Axis(fig)
sl = fig[2, 1] = Slider(fig, range = 0:10, startvalue = 3)
data = collect(1:2)
push!(data, to_value(sl.value))
scatter!(ax, data)
display(fig)```
